name: Notification of Discontinuation of Service/Resource on Appointment
description: Notification sent when ongoing services or resources for a recurring appointment series are discontinued
businessPurpose: Notify systems when ongoing services or resources are discontinued from recurring appointment series that have already begun
timing: Sent when ongoing services or resources need to be discontinued from a parent appointment series
realWorldScenarios: Physical therapy discontinued after patient reaches recovery goals
Ongoing IV therapy discontinued when patient switches to oral medication
Respiratory therapy discontinued when patient breathing improves
Social work services discontinued when family situation stabilizes
Nutrition counseling discontinued when patient achieves dietary goals
Mental health support discontinued when patient no longer requires ongoing therapy

generationRules.SCH.1: Parent appointment ID for series being discontinued
generationRules.AIS: Service discontinuation details for remaining appointments
generationRules.AIG: Resource group discontinuation details if applicable
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - accurate discontinuation prevents unnecessary resource allocation and billing errors
